original_text: As for the censers of these men who have sinned at the cost of their lives, let them be made into hammered plates as a covering for the altar, for they offered them before the Lord, and they became holy. Thus they shall be a sign to the people of Israel.”
korean_text: 사람들은 범죄하여 그들의 생명을 스스로 해하였거니와 그들이 향로를 여호와 앞에 드렸으므로 그 향로가 거룩하게 되었나니 그 향로를 쳐서 제단을 싸는 철판을 만들라 이스라엘 자손에게 표가 되리라 하신지라

sentences.original_text: As for the censers of these men,
who have sinned at the cost of their lives,
let them be made into hammered plates
as a covering for the altar,
for they offered them before the Lord,
Thus they shall be a sign
